review: The only thing I like more than writing ♥♥♥♥♥♥ reviews is playing a game like DotA...Between all non-English speaking people playing on English speaking servers,A lack of any form in in-game story,Bad teammates,Confusing gameplayand ♥♥♥♥♥♥ lag...I've had some of the best times of my life.Solid 12/10
